review:
When my health was down for weeks with major viral infection and fever, I fortunately came across Dr.Shashidhar in Apollo clinic who was very patient in listening to my health issues, instilled confidence in me and provided the right treatment at right time. Under weekly monitoring, I was able to recover very soon. It was gods blessing for me to meet him. Infact, I am impressed about his patience, listening skills, and recommending perfect medication based on patient body conditions. My heart felt sincere thanks to the doctor.

I highly recommend this doctor to anyone who wants to get treated on general medicine.
Doctor was very clear and did right diognnisis I'm the beginning , it was much helpful and cured in few days as expected

Was prescribing  cold medicine to son is already recovering from cold cough.Insisted on cough syrup .I i firmed i do t agree to cough syrup asked for herbal one and he wasannoyed**** *********** ******** *** ******* ***** **** *** *** ** **** ********When questioned him what he is prescribing was sounding angry & rude.I didn't appreciate that.Drs should be patient Paid 650 consultancy charge and now paid else where and got satisfactory treatment.

I went to the doctor for a cough. The doctor didn't say much, but gave me a prescription and told me to take it for 4 days. If my cough doesn't improve, he told me to come back for a blood check that costs 9k.

We booked the appointment and when we went to hospital, doctor was not available. We got a reply saying doctor is not available due to an emergency. Hospital staff didn't even bother to inform us in advance about doctor's unavailability. We had to travel a long distance to get to hospital and only then we came to know that doctor is not available. Extremely disappointed. At least they could have informed us in advance.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Me n my wife went yesterday to consult a blood report to dr Shashidara in Apollo clinic hsr layout. Doctor took hardly 2 min to attend our problem. My wife had fatty liver. He simply suggest vitamin d tables and asked us to consult a hair transplant doctor. Since my wife has hair fall problem **** *** *** *** ******* ** ** **** **** ********** ******* Doctor told us to stop all hair fall medicines without even asking what medicines she is taking. He never asked for her food habits, or to do exercises. He never explained what reasons can be for this fatty liver. ** *** ** * ****** ***** **** * ******* ****** ********* *** ** *** ****** **** ***** ********** Will never recommend anyone to consult him.
The doctor first checked all my vitals properly and treated me for my ailment with medicines. after I left, I lost my prescription and the doctor was kind enough to write me another one!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: shashidhar doesn't talk, we explained the problem, he nodded, checked temperature, checked bp, wrote some medicines and tick marked 5 ********** blood tests worth 3k and said next.definitely unsatisfied patients, ********** * ******** **** *** *******
overall a good experience while consulting the  doctor. The doctor was friendly and kind in resolving my queries

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Did not even speak more than 5 words. Was more keen in providing "package" of tests in the clinic than listening to my ailments. I completed the course of medicine and was still suffering.
